original:
Bangladesh is home to significant examples of Mughal architecture, with notable structures that reflect this historical style. Among these, the Ahsan Manzil stands out as a prominent monument. Originally the residence of the Nawabs of Dhaka, it has since been converted into a museum, showcasing the rich history of the region.

In contemporary times, Bangladeshi architecture has evolved to encompass a diverse range of styles, incorporati
